Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Elemental Evocation
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: The next Elemental you_play this turn costs (2) less.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: It's just lighter fluid.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Pounce
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Comes with an overwhelming urge to jump into the nearest open box.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Regenerate
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Restore #3 Health.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Finally a cure for degenerates.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Bloodclaw
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: This weapon – ow! Requires a little – OWW! Finesse.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Daring Fire-Eater
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn deals 2_more damage.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: A few hours later he DESTROYED the arena bathrooms.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Devastate
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Deal $4 damage to a damaged minion.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: No thanks, I already devast-ate.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Grim Rally
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Destroy a friendly minion. Give your minions +1/+1.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: There’s no “Aiiiieeee” in “Team.”

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Gurubashi Chicken
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Overkill: Gain +5 Attack.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: “Ya hold it by da feet, mon. Den ya THROW.”

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Gurubashi Offering
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: At the start of your turn, destroy this and gain 8_Armor.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: For a limited time, loa blessings are on a pray-one-get-two deal (on selected sacrifices only).

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Helpless Hatchling
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a Beast in your hand by (1).
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: It can’t be all that helpful. Not wif dose widdle wings!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Saronite Taskmaster
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 0/3 Free Agent with Taunt for_your opponent.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Don't even think of asking for time off.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Serrated Tooth
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Deathrattle: Give your minions Rush.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: The tooth hurts, don’t it?

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Shriek
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Discard your lowest Cost card. Deal $2 damage to all minions.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: The first warning sign of an oncoming warlock temper tantrum.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Spirit of the Dead
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. After a friendly minion dies, shuffle a 1-Cost copy of it into your deck.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Just because you’re dead doesn’t mean you’re off the team.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Spirit of the Raptor
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. After your hero attacks and __kills a minion, draw a card.__
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: “Loti! LOTI! Drop it. Drop it Loti! Down! Down Loti!”

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Spirit of the Rhino
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Stealth for 1 turn. Your Rush minions are Immune the turn they're summoned.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Where did they get this preposterous hypothesis?

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Springpaw
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Add a 1/1 Lynx with Rush to your hand.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: The terrible thing about lynxes is lynxes are terrible things. Their teeth are made out of biting, their paws are made out of springs!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: The Beast Within
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Give a friendly Beast +1/+1, then it attacks a random enemy minion.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Undoes years of obedience school training.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Totemic Smash
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Deal $2 damage. Overkill: Summon a basic Totem.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Trolls are the first group to have a totem survive atmospheric re-entry.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Wartbringer
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: If you played 2_spells this turn, deal 2_damage.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: “Does she cause them with magic, or just…like have a bucket she brings with her?”

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Auchenai Phantasm
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: “Okay kids did everyone remember to heal before we left?”

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Belligerent Gnome
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your opponent has 2 or more minions, gain +1 Attack.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Maybe don't put this one in your garden.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Big Bad Voodoo
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon a random minion that costs (1) more."
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Murlocs practice Small Nice Voodoo.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Bloodsail Howler
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other Pirate you control.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor:
They saw their fate a closin'
Aboard a pirate ship
On deck: The Howlin' Hozen
About to let one rip.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Booty Bay Bookie
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Coin.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Also makes a great librarian. She's really good at fixing books!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Cheaty Anklebiter
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Lifesteal Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Famed hunter of the deadly Achilliosaur.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Dozing Marksman
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Has +4 Attack while damaged.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: It's the sleeper of the set.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Dragon Roar
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Add 2 random Dragons to your hand.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Not to be confused with Dragon Yodel.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Firetree Witchdoctor
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: If your tree is on fire - stop, drop, and troll.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Flash of Light
Rastakhan's Rumble.text:
Restore #4 Health.
Draw a card.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Hey! No cameras allowed!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Headhunter's Hatchet
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Beast, gain +1 Durability.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Zul'jin's primary recruiting tool.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Immortal Prelate
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck. It keeps any enchantments.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor:
She protec.
She attac.
But most importantly,
she come bac.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Likkim
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Has +2 Attack while you have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: "I double frog dare you!"

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Revenge of the Wild
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Summon your Beasts that died this turn.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: My roommates only use Revenge of the Passive Aggressive.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Savage Striker
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Deal damage to an enemy minion equal to your hero's Attack.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Ruthless at tribal roasts.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Scarab Egg
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Scarabs.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: They say you can’t make an omelet without AHHH THEY’RE EATING MY FACE!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Seance
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Choose a minion. Add_a copy of it to your hand.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor:
“The spirits spoke to me.”
"What did they say?"
"You had lethal two turns ago."

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Serpent Ward
Rastakhan's Rumble.text:
At the end of your turn,
deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: When snakes get sick, they get sent to the Serpent Ward.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Sharkfin Fan
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Pirate.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: His taste in soup is criminal.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Shieldbreaker
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Silence an enemy minion with Taunt.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Can also break up fights, relationships, and unions.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Soup Vendor
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Whenever you restore 3 or more Health to your hero, draw a card.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Fresh from the floor of the arena!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Spellzerker
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Has Spell Damage +2 while damaged.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: But don’t ask her to use it in a sentence.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Spirit of the Bat
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Stealth for 1 turn. After a friendly minion dies, give a minion in your hand +1/+1.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Spirit of the Dragonhawk
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. Your Hero Power also targets adjacent minions.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Dragonhawks aren’t known for their accuracy.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Stolen Steel
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Discover a weapon (from another class).
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Because Thrall wouldn't lend me Doomhammer.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Waterboy
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn costs (0).
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: 100% organic troll sweat.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Banana Buffoon
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to your hand.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: You could say he has a certain appeal.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Bloodscalp Strategist
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, Discover a spell.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: “Shoot them in the face” is more of a tactic than a strategy.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Bog Slosher
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand and give it +2/+2.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: It's the bane of freshly mopped floors everywhere.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Drakkari Trickster
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Battlecry: Give each player a copy of a random card from their opponent's deck.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: “It’s an illusion, Malacrass!”

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Haunting Visions
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less. Discover a spell.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: When you're awake at 3 AM and can't stop thinking about that time you called your teacher "mom."

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: High Priest Thekal
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Convert all but 1_of your Hero's Health into Armor.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: "…and then I beat him with 1 Health!"

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Masked Contender
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: If you control a_Secret, cast a Secret from_your deck.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Knew Mysterious Challenger back when he was a Mysterious Squire.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Master's Call
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Discover a minion in your deck. If all 3 are Beasts, draw them all.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: "Hello? Yes, this is Huffer."

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Ornery Tortoise
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: "Dude, where's my pizza?!"

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Overlord's Whip
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: "This merit badge is for cruelty. This one's for whipping. And this one is for embroidery..."

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Pyromaniac
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Whenever your Hero Power_kills a minion, draw a card.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: She prefers “Flammably Inclined.”

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Raiding Party
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Draw 2 Pirates from_your deck. Combo: And a weapon.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: And a bowl of chips. And some of those little cocktail weenies!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Reckless Diretroll
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Taunt Battlecry: Discard your lowest Cost card.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: "Reck less!? ME WRECK MOAR!"

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Sand Drudge
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Zombie with Taunt.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Loves long walks on the beach, raising the dead, and chocolates.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Smolderthorn Lancer
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a damaged enemy minion.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Here comes “The Smolder.”

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Spirit of the Frog
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. Whenever you cast a spell, draw a spell from your deck that costs (1) more.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: It is Wednesday, my dudes.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Spirit of the Lynx
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. Whenever you summon a Beast, give it +1/+1.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Much of this shrine’s power lies in the can-opener noise it makes.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Splitting Image
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a copy of it.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Sometimes you get punched so hard they see double.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Surrender to Madness
Rastakhan's Rumble.text:
[x]Destroy 3 of your Mana
Crystals. Give all minions
in your deck +2/+2.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Never give up, always surrender!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Time Out!
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Your hero is Immune until your next turn.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Highly effective against 3 year olds.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Untamed Beastmaster
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Whenever you draw a Beast, give it +2/+2.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: All it takes is a tummy rub.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Wardruid Loti
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Choose One - Transform into one of Loti's four dinosaur forms.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor:
“Ravasaur!”
“Pretty scary”
“…Blammodax!”
“Is that a thing?”
“SMAXODON!”
“….now you’re just making those up.”

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Zentimo
Rastakhan's Rumble.text:
[x]Whenever you target a
minion with a spell, cast it
again on its neighbors.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Serenity. Peace. Many frogs.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Arena Fanatic
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Her fantasy Rumble league gives double points for dismemberment.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Arena Treasure Chest
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Deathrattle: Draw 2 cards.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Yeah it's great, but did you see the Arena Treasure Arms?!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Griftah
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover two cards. Give one to your opponent at random.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: With Griftah in your deck, sometimes you start the game with The Coin!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Half-Time Scavenger
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Stealth Overkill: Gain 3 Armor.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: One player's trash is another's “Best In Slot”.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: High Priestess Jeklik
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal When you discard this, add 2 copies of it to your hand.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: If you love Jeklik, set her free. YOU CAN'T GET RID OF HER.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Ice Cream Peddler
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: If you control a_Frozen minion, gain 8_Armor.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: I scream, you scream, we all scream when we see a Freeze Mage.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Mark of the Loa
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Choose One - Give a minion +2/+4 and Taunt; or Summon two 3/2 Raptors.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Ah, yes. Mark. The mightiest Loa.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Murloc Tastyfin
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Deathrattle: Draw 2 Murlocs from your deck.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: He was destined for the soup. One way or another…

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Predatory Instincts
Rastakhan's Rumble.text:
[x]Draw a Beast from your
deck. Double its Health.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Somebody’s been eating their funnel cakes.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Regeneratin' Thug
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: At the start of your turn, restore #2 Health to this_minion.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Regenerates any injury except heartbreak.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Rumbletusk Shaker
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Rumbletusk Breaker.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor:
Rub a dub dub, three trolls in a tub.
And who do you think dey be?
Da Shaker, Da Breaker, and Da Undatakah.
And all of dem comin' for me.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Scorch
Rastakhan's Rumble.text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. Costs (1) if you
played an Elemental
last turn.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor:
The hoof.
The hoof.
The hoof is on fire.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Spirit of the Shark
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. Your minions' Battlecries __and Combos trigger twice._
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: It has Stealth, but its ominous theme music keeps giving it away.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Spirit of the Tiger
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. After you cast a spell, summon a Tiger with stats equal to its Cost.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Less of a cantrip and more of a cat-nip.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Ticket Scalper
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Overkill: Draw 2 cards.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Takes ten percent off the top.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Walk the Plank
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Destroy an undamaged minion.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Pirates will fall for anything.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: War Master Voone
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Copy all Dragons in your hand.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: War Master sounds cooler than Dragon Sitter.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Zandalari Templar
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've restored 10 Health this game, gain +4/+4 and Taunt.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: YOU WERE A TEMPLAR, JONDAR!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Arena Patron
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Overkill: Summon another Arena Patron.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Everybody with a ticket get in here!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Baited Arrow
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Deal $3 damage. Overkill: Summon a 5/5 Devilsaur.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: The card is common, but the steak is rare.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Blast Wave
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Deal $2 damage to_all minions. Overkill: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: If you’re burning and you know it, wave your hands!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Dragonmaw Scorcher
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Caution: Contains Flammable Material

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Emberscale Drake
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: The third little dragon made his armor out of adamantite.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Farraki Battleaxe
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Overkill: Give a minion in your hand +2/+2.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Only two things in life are certain: death and axes.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Former Champ
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5_Hotshot.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: The last time he saw action, Undertaker ruled the meta.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Gral, the Shark
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Battlecry: Eat a minion in your deck and gain its stats. Deathrattle: Add it to your hand.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: “… We’re gonna need a bigger board.”

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Halazzi, the Lynx
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Fill your hand with 1/1 Lynxes that have_Rush.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Remember, you’re only as strong as your weakest lynx.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Mass Hysteria
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Force each minion to_attack another random minion.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Black Friday gets worse every year.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Mosh'Ogg Announcer
Rastakhan's Rumble.text:
[x]Enemies attacking this
have a 50% chance to
attack someone else.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: One's play-by-play. The other is off-color.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Sightless Ranger
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Rush Overkill: Summon two 1/1_Bats.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: An eye for sore sights.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Snapjaw Shellfighter
Rastakhan's Rumble.text:
[x]Whenever an adjacent
minion takes damage, this
_minion takes it instead.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Nonono, the turtle is the Shellfighter.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Treespeaker
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Transform your Treants into 5/5 Ancients.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Honestly, his delivery is a little wooden.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Arcanosaur
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, deal_3_damage_to_all other minions.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Arcane energy… finds a way.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Cannon Barrage
Rastakhan's Rumble.text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
random enemy. Repeat
for each of your Pirates.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Why fire your cannons strategically when you can fire them all at once?

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Heavy Metal!
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Summon a random minion with Cost equal to your Armor (up to 10).
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: This metal is so heavy it will satisfy your iron requirements for the next year.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Krag'wa, the Frog
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Return all spells you played last turn to_your hand.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Krag'wa has a ritual to honor his friends and a ritual to devour his enemies. No one can tell them apart.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Mojomaster Zihi
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Set each player to 5 Mana Crystals.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Sadly, she was still two credits short of her Witch Doctorate.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Rain of Toads
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Summon three 2/4 Toads with Taunt. Overload: (3)
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: "Oh, THAT'S how she brings the warts!"

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Soulwarden
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Add 3 random cards you discarded this game to your hand.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Reduce, reuse, resoul.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Stampeding Roar
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Summon a random Beast from your hand and give it Rush.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor:
[x]The Gurubashi Arena has an
extremely permissive policy on
pets in the workplace.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Sul'thraze
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Overkill: You may attack again.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: “Griftah here with de Sul’chop. One chop, you get four damage. Two chops, eight damage - you gonna change de way you fight."

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: A New Challenger...
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon it with Taunt and Divine Shield.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: … Arrives? Approaches? TELL US ALREADY!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Amani War Bear
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Rush Taunt
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: "I used to farm for hours! Now they just come in packs?"

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Blood Troll Sapper
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Main supplier of Blood Troll Syrup to the Intercontinental Hut of Funnel Cakes.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Bwonsamdi, the Dead
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1-Cost minions from your deck until your hand is full.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Everyone's dying to meet him.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Crowd Roaster
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 7 damage to an enemy minion.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Every major show has an opening act to warm up the crowd.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Gonk, the Raptor
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: After your hero attacks and_kills a minion, it may_attack again.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: There’s a word for Zandalari druids who refuse to pledge loyalty to Gonk: “Delicious.”

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Gurubashi Hypemon
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Discover a 1/1 copy of a Battlecry minion. It costs (1).
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor:
Throw your hands in the air!
They cost (1).

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Ironhide Direhorn
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Overkill: Summon a 5/5_Ironhide Runt.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: "Boy! Bring me my masks and skull rams."

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Jan'alai, the Dragonhawk
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Battlecry: If your Hero Power dealt 8 damage this game, summon Ragnaros the Firelord.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: You mess with the Bird, you get the Firelord.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Linecracker
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Overkill: Double this minion's Attack.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: "Tell me if you’ve heard this one!"

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Rabble Bouncer
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each enemy minion.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: "Shirt? Shoes!? No service!"

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Akali, the Rhino
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Rush Overkill: Draw a Rush minion from your deck. Give it +5/+5.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Most trolls only get to “AAAAHHH!” and don’t make it to the “kali” part.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Captain Hooktusk
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Pirates from your deck. Give them Rush.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: "You three! Get in the cannon!"

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Da Undatakah
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle effects of 3 friendly minions that died this game.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor:
First Deathrattle: Draw a card.
Second: Draw 2 cards.
Third: Throw Mon'kind off a steel cage and plummet sixteen feet through an announcer’s table.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Demonbolt
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Destroy a minion. Costs (1) less for each minion you control.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Or as it’s known in troll, “De bolt, mon.”

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Hex Lord Malacrass
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Add a copy of your opening hand to your hand (except this card).
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Extremely awkward cousin of Hex Lord Malaclass.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Hir'eek, the Bat
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Fill your board with copies of this minion.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: REPEL’S EFFECT WORE OFF.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Mosh'Ogg Enforcer
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Taunt Divine Shield
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Can’t break the rules if you can’t read ‘em.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Princess Talanji
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Battlecry: Summon all minions from your hand that_didn't start in your_deck.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Everyone wants to be a princess, but nobody ever considers the size of the hat.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Void Contract
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Destroy half of each player's deck.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: “YOU SIGNED WHAT?!”

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Oondasta
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Rush Overkill: Summon a Beast from your hand.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Adorning devilsaurs with armor and feathers is a respected job in troll culture, although it has a high turnover rate.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Hakkar, the Soulflayer
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a Corrupted Blood into each player's deck.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: ATTENTION: Do not enter any major city while infected with the Corrupted Blood!

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Zul'jin
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Battlecry: Cast all spells you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: If you can dodge an axe, you can dodge a ball.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Grave Horror
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast this game.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: Trolls can regenerate lost limbs, but this is what they do with the leftovers.

Rastakhan's Rumble.name: Shirvallah, the Tiger
Rastakhan's Rumble.text: [x]Divine Shield, Rush, Lifesteal Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on spells.
Rastakhan's Rumble.flavor: On bended knee Thekal placed his weapon upon Shirvallah’s altar, whereupon she slowly knocked it off with her paw.
